resources.string: Assalam o Alaikum\n My name is %%Name\n and I am working with Centre of Excellence in Women and Child Health, Aga Khan University Karachi with the collaboration of National Ministry of Health Services, Regulation and Coordination Government of Pakistan and Provincial Health Departments of Balochistan, Punjab and Sindh. I believe the data collector has asked you a number of questions regarding maternal and child health. I would like to confirm a few questions for monitoring purposes.
Did the data collector visit your house?
Did the data collector greet you when she came?
Did the data collector introduce herself?
Did the data collector take informed consent?
Name of Head of the household
Total number of members in the household
Total number of eligible women in the household
Number of children less than 5 yrs in the HH
Total number of pregnancies among the WRAs in the HH
Number of children born live in the HH who are still alive
God Forbid (Khuda Na Khuwasta), did any woman in your household die in the past five years due to complications related to pregnancy, delivery and 42 days after delivery
Has any child less than 5 years of age in the household had diarrhea in the last 2 weeks in your household
Has any child had an illness with cough that he/she breathes faster than usual with short, rapid breaths or has difficulty breathing in the past two weeks
Did any child have do chest x-ray
Do you have a separate room which is used as a kitchen
How many rooms in this HH are used for sleeping
What language do you usually speak in your household
What is the main source of drinking water for members of your household
Piped into compound, yard or plot
Surface water (river, stream, dam, lake, pond, canal, irrigation channel)
Do you have any soap or detergent or ash/mud/sand in your house for washing hands
